review: I was excited to be able to watch tv from my bedroom. Sadly after several hours attempting to set it up I had to quit. it would only register one bar of my wifi. Netflix wouldn't get past the load screen without erroring. Amazon let me go to the sign-in screen but kept rejecting my password, then it froze. I tried it in my mother's room (where wifi router is located) and it worked flawlessly. I tried it in the living room and again it worked perfectly. The distance from the living room to router is MAYBE 5 feet closer than in my room with more walls for the signal to pass through. I returned it to Wal Mart (where I originally purchased it) and bought the Roku 3 instead.
